title: Mizoram football team
text:
The Mizoram football team is an Indian <a href="association%20football">football</a> team representing <a href="Mizoram">Mizoram</a> and were the champions of the <a href="Santosh%20Trophy">Santosh Trophy</a> in the 2013–14 season.
In the finals of <a href="2013%E2%80%9314%20Santosh%20Trophy">2013–14 Santosh Trophy</a>, played on 9 March 2014 at <a href="Kanchenjunga%20Stadium">Kanchenjunga Stadium</a>, Siliguri, debutant Mizoram beat the <a href="Railways%20football%20team">Railways</a> 3–0 to win the trophy, and the Rs 5 <a href="lakh">lakh</a> prize money, while the runners up Railways received Rs. 3 lakh.
